fields.title: On Hurt Entity
fields.description: An event trigger that fires when this item successfully damages another entity.

fields.title: On Not Hurt Entity
fields.description: An event trigger that fires when this item hits an entity but deals no damage (e.g., due to invincibility frames or immunity).

fields.title: On Hit Block
fields.description: An event trigger that fires when this item is used to strike a block.
